approves.approved_1: Hooray! Your recipe "{{ .title }}" is excellent, so it is already published and available to all visitors. Thank you for your effort, which undoubtedly will please someone.
approves.approved_2: Excellent! Your wonderful recipe "{{ .title }}" is published and available to all visitors. Thank you for this little miracle.
approves.approved_3: We really liked your recipe "{{ .title }}", it is already available to all visitors. We are glad that you are part of our huge family.
approves.approved_4: We are glad to inform you that your excellent recipe "{{ .title }}" is published and available to all visitors. Thank you for writing such great recipes.
approves.approved_5: We just verified your recipe "{{ .title }}" and we like it. Now it's published and available to all our visitors. We appreciate your effort
approves.message_min: The message must be at least {{ .min }} characters
approves.message_max: The message may not be greater than {{ .max }} characters
approves.currently_approving: <u><b>{{ .admin }}</b></u> is currently verifying the recipe from <u><b>{{ .user }}</b></u>
approves.approve_or_not: Check the recipe for errors, obscene words and links to various resources. Also make sure that the content of this recipe does not have a negative effect on readers. Are you sure you to publish this recipe?
approves.are_you_sure_to_cancel: Do you really want to return this recipe to the author for revision?
approves.set_message_desc: State the reason why the recipe cannot be published so that the author of the recipe could correct the error.
approves.set_message: Enter the message to the author of the recipe.
approves.are_you_sure_to_publish: Confirm that you want to publish this recipe
auth.failed: These credentials do not match our records.
auth.throttle: Too many login attempts. Please try again in {{ .seconds }} seconds.
auth.access_denied: You don't have an access to this page
auth.access_denied_only_auth: Access to this page is only for authorized users
auth.username_alpha_dash: Username field can only contain latin letters, numbers, underscore and dash
auth.username_regex: Username field can only contain latin letters, numbers, underscore and dash
auth.username_min: The username must be at least {{ .min }} characters
auth.username_max: The username may not be greater than {{ .max }} characters
auth.password_min: The password must be at least {{ .min }} characters
auth.password_max: The password may not be greater than {{ .max }} characters
contact.contact_email_email: The email must be a valid email address
contact.contact_message_min: The message must be at least {{ .min }} characters
contact.contact_message_max: The message may not be greater than {{ .max }} characters
contact.sure_del_feed: Confirm that you want to remove this message
contact.intro: If you have any requests or objections to our work, we are always ready to listen to your opinion or comment. We have created this page where you can send us a message, which we will read and take the necessary measures.
errors.401_description: Sorry, you are not authorized to access this page.
errors.403_description: The server understood the request, but is refusing to fulfill it. Authorization will not help and the request SHOULD NOT be repeated.
errors.419_description: Sorry, your session has expired. Please refresh and try again.
errors.404_description: The page you were looking for could not be found.
errors.500_description: Something has gone wrong on the server, we cannot be specific on what the exact problem is
errors.503_title: Website is unavailable due to a temporary maintenance
errors.503_description: The server is currently unable to handle the request due to a temporary maintenance of the website. The implication is that this is a temporary condition which will be alleviated after some delay.
feedback.report_message_desc: If you have a comment or complaint about this recipe, describe your complaint in the message field below, and we will immediately deal with this situation.
feedback.success_message: We received your message. Thank you for your time, we certainly appreciate it.
feedback.operation_denied: The message can be sent no more than once a day.
feedback.already_reported_today: You have already sent a complain on this recipe.
forms.name: Name
forms.agree_to_terms: By clicking on the {{ .btn }} button, you accept the terms specified in the <a href="/docs/terms/" class="text" style="text-decoration{{ .underline }}" target="_blank">User Agreement</a>
forms.message_desc: This field is for your message
forms.name_desc: You can specify your name or nickname as you like. The name you specify will be displayed on all your recipes and on your account profile. The name can be changed at any time in the settings. Example: Alexandra
forms.pwd_desc: Enter a new password. You will need it to enter your account. The password is a confirmation of your identity, so that no one can have the access to edit your recipes. Attention! Your password must be strong, for this it must contain characters, letters and numbers.
forms.pwd2_desc: Enter the password again to make sure that you did not make any mistakes
logs.confirm: Are you sure to delete a log file for {{ .date }} date?
logs.page_is_not_avail: This can be viewed only by users with certain rights
manage-users.are_you_sure_to_ban: Are you sure you want to block this user?
manage-users.are_you_sure_to_unban: Are you sure you want to unblock this user?
manage-users.what_reason_to_ban: Specify the reason for which the user will be blocked, and the number of days during which the user has limited access to the site
manage-users.user_banned: User was blocked. Number of days for which the user is blocked: {{ .days }}
manage-users.user_already_banned: You cannot block the user that is already blocked
manage-users.days_required: Specify the number of days for which you want to block the user.
manage-users.days_numeric: Days must be specified in numbers
manage-users.message_min: The message must be at least {{ .min }} characters
manage-users.message_max: The message may not be greater than {{ .max }} characters
messages.confirm_email_message: In order to confirm email on Reciper click on button below
messages.login_to_add_recipe: In order to add your own recipe you has to be signed in. Please sign in into your account or register.
messages.sure_to_logout: Are you sure you want to sign out from your account?
messages.query_error: Some content can't be shown due to the unexpected error
messages.congrats_streak_days: <i class="fas fa-fire left" style="color{{ .orangered }}"></i> + {{ .xp }} for streak days
pages.title_footer: When copying any materials from the site, an active link to the site is required.
pages.use_search: Use the search to find recipes or ingredients
passwords.password: Password must be at least 8 characters and match the confirmation
passwords.sent: Link to reset your password has been sent!
passwords.user: Could not find the user with specified email address
passwords.sent_code_desc: After sending this form, you will receive a message with a link to reset your password by clicking on this link, you will be taken to a page where you can enter your new password.
passwords.we_got_request: We received a request to reset the password for the user {{ .username }}, who specified this email address in the settings. To reset your password, click the button below.
passwords.ignore_if_not_you: If you have not made any requests and received this message by mistake, just ignore this email.
recipers.next_streak_day: Hours left to the next streak day
recipers.no_recipes_yet: You don't have any recipes yet
recipers.reciper_doesnt_have_recipes: This Reciper doesn't have any recipes
recipers.activate_account_desc: The account will be deleted in {{ .days }} days. If you want to restore your data, click button below.
recipers.account_recovered: <i class="fas fa-heart red-text left"></i> Hooray! The account has been restored. Welcome back to the family
recipes.title: Title
recipes.name_for_recipe: Specify the name of the recipe
recipes.search_by_author: Show all recipes by this author
recipes.are_you_sure_to_delete: Do you really want to delete this recipe?
recipes.are_you_sure_to_draft: Your recipe will not be available to visitors after moving it to drafts. Do you really want to put this recipe in drafts?
recipes.want_to_switch_lang: In order to translate the recipe into Russian you need to change the site language. Change the language to Russian?
recipes.no_rights_to_see: You do not have the right to view this recipe, as it has not yet been published
recipes.not_written: This recipe is in the process of writing
recipes.not_approved: This recipe has not yet been verified
recipes.cant_draft: You do not have permission to edit this recipe
recipes.added_to_approving: The recipe has been added for review and will be published after approval by the administration
recipes.you_gave_recipe_back_on_editing: You returned the recipe for re-editing
recipes.deleted_fail: An error occurred while deleting the recipe
recipes.title_min: The title must be at least {{ .min }} characters
recipes.title_max: The title may not be greater than {{ .max }} characters
recipes.intro_min: The intro must be at least {{ .min }} characters
recipes.intro_max: The intro may not be greater than {{ .max }} characters
recipes.ingredients_min: The ingredients field must be at least {{ .min }} characters
recipes.ingredients_max: The ingredients field may not be greater than {{ .max }} characters
recipes.text_min: The text must be at least {{ .min }} characters
recipes.text_max: The text may not be greater than {{ .max }} characters
recipes.categories_distinct: Categories must be different, remove duplicate categories
recipes.categories_numeric: Category selection fields should contain only proposed options
recipes.meal_numeric: The reception time field must be a number
recipes.meal_between: The reception time field must contain one of the suggested options
recipes.time_numeric: The time must be a number
recipes.time_between: The time must be a number between {{ .min }} and {{ .max }}
recipes.image_mimes: The image must only be in the following formats {{ .values }}
register.scene_add_account: Create a personal account in 10 seconds. Just enter username and password you want
register.scene_add_recipe: Add recipes with nice interface and ability to save or preview the recipe
register.scene_translate: Translate your recipe into another language and make it open to the whole world
register.scene_watch_stats: You can view detailed statistics of your recipes in the statistics page
settings.saved_now_verify_email: Email address saved. To confirm this email address, we have sent a message to your email address with confirmation code
settings.choose_photo: Here you can choose a photo that will be displayed on your page and in all your recipes. To choose a new photo hover over the photo and press the "{{ .btn }}" button to select a file.
settings.there_are_no_file: First, you need to select a file
settings.delete_account_desc: To confirm deletion of the account, enter your current password and click delete. Your page will be deactivated without data loss. You can restore access within 30 days after the removal. After the time expiration, your account will be permanently deleted.
settings.are_you_sure_to_deactivate: We will miss you ðŸ˜¢ Do you really want to deactivate the account?
settings.email_change_once_per_week: The email address can only be changed once a week
settings.not_verified: <i class="fas fa-times"></i> Email the address is not confirmed!
settings.photo_image: The file is not an image
settings.photo_uploaded: Downloading has failed, perhaps this is due to the large file size, the image should not exceed 1999 Kbytes
settings.photo_mimes: The image should only be in the following formats {{ .values }}
settings.name_min: The name must be at least {{ .min }} characters
settings.name_max: The name may not be greater than {{ .max }} characters
settings.about_me_max: The about me field may not be greater than {{ .max }} characters
settings.old_pwd_string: Old password must be a string
settings.pwd_min: The password must be at least {{ .min }} characters
settings.pwd_max: The password may not be greater than {{ .max }} characters
settings.email_max: The email may not be greater than {{ .max }} characters
settings.email_email: The email address must be in the correct email format
settings.email_unique: User with this email already exists
tips.remember_info: Check the checkbox if you do not want to fill out this form every time you are signing into your account
tips.email_settings_tip: Your email is needed only for the case if you forget your password. Then you will have the opportunity to restore access to your account.
tips.recipes_text: Describe the process of cooking dishes by steps, using the Enter button to separate items from each other. Example:<br> After the carrot is cleaned, rub it on the grater (Enter) <br> Add 1 teaspoon of salt, a half teaspoon of sugar and 3 drops of vinegar to the grated carrot.
tips.recipes_ingredients: Specify all the ingredients of the dish. After each ingredient, press the Enter button to divide them into lines. Example:<br>1 kg of carrots (Enter) <br>1 small onion (Enter) <br>1 clove of garlic
tips.recipes_intro: In this field, provide a brief description of the recipe. The easiest recipe for semolina in milk, which you can only find. Of course, after the porridge is ready we can add jam or berries to it, thereby decorating and enriching its taste.
tips.recipes_meal: The best time to take your meal. Breakfast is a charge of energy. For breakfast, usually people eat cereals and dairy products, eggs, fruits, drinks. Lunch should be nourishing and low-fat. Usually, porridge, meat or fish, soup, vegetables are eaten at lunch. Dinner is an evening meal. For dinner will be fine dishes like meat, fish or vegetables.
validation.active_url: The {{ .attribute }} is not a valid URL.
validation.after: The {{ .attribute }} must be a date after {{ .date }}.
validation.after_or_equal: The {{ .attribute }} must be a date after or equal to {{ .date }}.
validation.alpha_dash: The {{ .attribute }} may only contain letters, numbers, and dashes.
validation.alpha_num: The {{ .attribute }} may only contain letters and numbers.
validation.before: The {{ .attribute }} must be a date before {{ .date }}.
validation.before_or_equal: The {{ .attribute }} must be a date before or equal to {{ .date }}.
validation.between: The {{ .attribute }} must be between {{ .min }} and {{ .max }} digits.
validation.boolean: The {{ .attribute }} field must be true or false.
validation.date: The {{ .attribute }} is not a valid date.
validation.date_format: The {{ .attribute }} does not match the format {{ .format }}.
validation.distinct: The {{ .attribute }} field has a duplicate value.
validation.email: The {{ .attribute }} must be a valid email address.
validation.filled: The {{ .attribute }} field must have a value.
validation.in_array: The {{ .attribute }} field does not exist in {{ .other }}.
validation.ip: The {{ .attribute }} must be a valid IP address.
validation.ipv4: The {{ .attribute }} must be a valid IPv4 address.
validation.ipv6: The {{ .attribute }} must be a valid IPv6 address.
validation.json: The {{ .attribute }} must be a valid JSON string.
validation.max.numeric: The {{ .attribute }} may not be greater than {{ .max }}.
validation.max.file: The {{ .attribute }} may not be greater than {{ .max }} kilobytes.
validation.max.string: The {{ .attribute }} may not be greater than {{ .max }} characters.
validation.max.array: The {{ .attribute }} may not have more than {{ .max }} items.
validation.mimes: The {{ .attribute }} must be a file of type: {{ .values }}.
validation.mimetypes: The {{ .attribute }} must be a file of type: {{ .values }}.
validation.min.file: The {{ .attribute }} must be at least {{ .min }} kilobytes.
validation.min.string: The {{ .attribute }} must be at least {{ .min }} characters.
validation.min.array: The {{ .attribute }} must have at least {{ .min }} items.
validation.required_if: The {{ .attribute }} field is required when {{ .other }} is {{ .value }}.
validation.required_unless: The {{ .attribute }} field is required unless {{ .other }} is in {{ .values }}.
validation.required_with: The {{ .attribute }} field is required when {{ .values }} is present.
validation.required_with_all: The {{ .attribute }} field is required when {{ .values }} is present.
validation.required_without: The {{ .attribute }} field is required when {{ .values }} is not present.
validation.required_without_all: The {{ .attribute }} field is required when none of {{ .values }} are present.
validation.timezone: The {{ .attribute }} must be a valid zone.
